name: Nucor Corporation
summary: Nucor Corporation is a leading American steel producer, specializing in structural steel, steel bars, steel joists, steel deck, and cold finished bars. Headquartered in Charlotte, North Carolina, Nucor operates a network of mini-mills and facilities primarily in the United States and Canada, serving customers across North America. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker NUE and is recognized for its growth through acquisitions and geographic expansion.
